#summary Installation of toolboxes in jlabgroovy.

= Introduction =

`Installation of .jar toolboxes is very important and allows convenient access to Java scientific libraries. In ` *`jlabgroovy`* ` we can easily install .jar toolboxes that remain installed for later working sessions. We illustrate installation of a toolbox by means of an example.`


= Example =

`Suppose that we want to install the ` *`jWave.jar`* `toolbox. We proceed by opening the ` *`GroovySci Toolboxes`* `tab. A frame titled ` *`GroovySci toolboxes`* `is displayed that allows convenient installation of toolboxes.`
